block.title: Crittercism API Info

input.label: This is the Client ID that you received from Crittercism Support

block.text: - To change the Credentials or Crittercism API Key later, first remove the entry from SPLUNK_HOME/etc/apps/crittercism/local/app.conf and restart Splunk.
- The script may take up to 10 minutes to start getting data into the Crittercism dashboards.
